-- | Server for TorXakis

--   Server for TorXakis
@package server
@version 0.2.1.0

module CmdLineParser
optsP :: Parser CmdLineConfig

-- | Configuration options read by the command line.
data CmdLineConfig
CmdLineConfig :: Maybe String -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe PortNumber -> CmdLineConfig
[clSmtSolver] :: CmdLineConfig -> Maybe String
[clSmtLog] :: CmdLineConfig -> Maybe Bool
[clPortNumber] :: CmdLineConfig -> Maybe PortNumber
parseCmdLine :: IO CmdLineConfig
instance GHC.Show.Show CmdLineParser.CmdLineConfig
instance GHC.Classes.Eq CmdLineParser.CmdLineConfig
